def_cn: （某人或某团体独享的）特权，优惠
def_en: A privilege is a special right or advantage that only one person or group has.

def_cn: （常指因财富、社会地位而享有的）特权，优惠
def_en: If you talk about privilege, you are talking about the power and advantage that only a small group of people have, usually because of their wealth or their high social class.
You can use privilege in expressions such as be a privilege or have the privilege when you want to show your appreciation of someone or something or to show your respect.

def_cn: 特殊对待；给予…特权；给予…优待
def_en: To privilege someone or something means to treat them better or differently than other people or things rather than treat them all equally.
